quizDescription.text:
Instruction :
  1. This section is not an openbook.
  2. On the screen recording software when you start this section
  3. Write all the options in lower case, in case multiple options write as comma separated (x,y,z)

questionText.text:
Which of the following models is the most interpretable?
a. CART
b. Random Forests
c. Logistic Regression
d. All of the above
How many splits are in the following CART tree?

Which parameter in r controls the number of splits of a CART model?
a. rpart
b. split
c. minbucket
d. Seed

Let us suppose the Amazon Mechanical Turk workers are perfect and will not make any mistake when labelling tweets as strongly negative (-2 score) , negative (-1 score), neutral (0 score), positive (1 score) and strongly positive (2 score), which of the following would be a more accurate measure of a product?
a, Average of the scores
b. Overall score maximum
c. Median of the scores
d. None of the above

Which of the following is not a step of pre-processing for text analysis?
a. Removing stop words
b. Cleaning up irregularities
c. Calculating threshold
d. Stemming
